overview:
Established in the year 2001, at Pune (Maharashtra, India), we, “Perfect Solutions”, are engaged in supplying a comprehensive assortment of Scraps like Compressor Scraps, Copper Wire Scraps and Heavy Metal Scraps.

Products & Services: AC Compressor Scraps Refrigerator Compressor Scraps Wire Scraps Heavy Metal Scraps Recruitment Services

Our Team: We are backed by a proficient and a diligent team of professionals who make us able to offer our clients a superior quality products and services. Our professionals are recruited on the basis of their experience and industrial knowledge.

Vendor Base:’ We have selected the most reliable and genuine vendors from the industry in order to offer the premium quality range of scraps. Our vendors acquire a distinct position in the industry due to their quality assured products.

]Quality Assurance: As a quality driven firm, our endeavors are directed to offer our clients a premium quality products and services. We have hired an experienced team of quality experts, who helps us in sourcing quality assured products from the certified vendors of the industry.

Client Satisfaction: The foremost objective of our organization is to provide maximum satisfaction to our clients by providing them excellent quality products and services as per their specific requirements.
